pos review: The location is great and the mix with industrial and nature makes it a great place to relax!
neg review: The bed was to hard to sleep for me. But the rest was amazing! A place to find peace!

pos review: This is a bit unusual hotel, very tiny rooms, but very nice common spaces. The living room with the views towards nature was wonderful.  Breakfast was lovely, the small pancakes brought to the table were supper fluffy and melting in the mouth.  The pool is tiny and a bit cold, but our kids enjoyed it. It was very quiet at night.
neg review: For a hotel attached to a recording studio, I did not expect to have radio blasting in the common spaces. Would it be difficult to play some record or a playlist? The lightning in the room was dim.

pos review: Clean. Nice staff. Modern. Relaxed. Easy going. No worries
Fantastically different and refreshing nothing not to like!

neg review: Having a light in the shower would be nice and a water bottle in the room would be appreciated too, other than this, perfect

pos review: Good breakfast, however a bit strange to seperate Hotel and Glamping as it is done
Another style hotel, concept of cinema, spa and drinks for use. Great
